author: samwilsn
content:
After some discussion with <@!415548822983278593>, you can support grandma having an AA smart contract wallet which holds Dai and no ETH!

Grandma signs sub-TX
Grandma sends AA TX targetting AA relayer to transfer Dai to relayer
Relayer does the exchange
Relayer calls into Grandma's wallet, passing signed sub-TX
Grandma's wallet performs sub-TX
